DOC.brief_summary: To characterize the single- and multiple-dose pharmacokinetics of oxycodone following the administration of ALO-02 40 Mg Twice Daily, ALO-02 80 Mg Once Daily or Oxycontin 40 Mg Twice Daily in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Study of ALO-02 and OxyContin
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years, inclusive. Evidence or history of clinically significant diseases.
